title: Metals
brief_description: Sir Lawrence Bragg shows the different properties of metals, illustrates their characteristics, demonstrates the crystalling structure of aluminium, and shows how the same piece of metal can have different properties according to treatment. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
